article.title: Dandelion: supporting coordinated, collaborative authoring in Wikis
article.author: Chi, Changyan
Zhou, Michelle X.
Yang, Min
Xiao, Wenpeng
Yu, Yiqin
Sun, Xiaohua
article.abstract: Dandelion is a tool that extends wikis to support coordinated, collaborative authoring using a tag-based approach. Specifically, users can insert tags in a wiki page to specify various co-authoring tasks. These tags can then be executed to help drive and manage the collaboration workflow, and provide content-centric collaboration awareness for all the co-authors. Four successful pilot deployments and positive user feedback show the practical value of Dandelion, especially its value in supporting a structured, collaborative authoring process often seen in business settings.
